ygData.msgSnippet: Mystic Alliance, at least on Rodcet ... From:  To:  Sent: Saturday, December 09, 2000 2:44 AM Subject:
ygData.messageBody:
Mystic Alliance, at least on Rodcet
----- Original Message -----
From: <EQ_rainbow@egroups.com>
To: <EQ_rainbow@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, December 09, 2000 2:44 AM
Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Digest Number 198


>
> There are 4 messages in this issue.
>
> Topics in this digest:
>
> 1. Re: Hello all
> From: Andy Cottrell <andy@...>
> 2. Re: Hello all
> From: Andy Cottrell <andy@...>
> 3. Re: Hello all
> From: Christina Norman <tina@...>
> 4. Re: Hello all
> From: Terry Walker <mellowtigger@...>
>
>
> ________________________________________________________________________
> ________________________________________________________________________
>
> Message: 1
> Date: Fri, 08 Dec 2000 10:17:06 -0500
> From: Andy Cottrell <andy@...>
> Subject: Re: Hello all
>
> Hi Owen,
> I do not know anyone on the Brell server. We have a gay guild on
Rodcet
> Nife. If you ever think about switching servers come join up with us =)
> We have people who would powerlevel your characters up to where you are
> now. We have a few bears in our guild (including my lover) and are
> accepting of everyone as long as they accept us (even breeders =P). The
> guild is more centered around the game than it is our sexuality. The
guild
> is a place where we can play free of harassment and when people do harass
us
> we have the rest of the guild to back us up. We are over 50 strong now in
> the Mystic Alliance. There is also a bear specific guild on the Lanys
T'Vyl
> server. I just recently created a character there and joined them but
they
> are a smaller guild.
>
> Andy Cottrell
> Taren Despottrell
> Mystic Alliance Guildleader
> 41st Barbarian Shaman
>
> We also have a website. http://mysticalliance.im1ru12.org If you want a
> member account email me and I'll set it up. We also have a guild mailing
> list on egroups(which is changing to Yahoo) look for mysticalliance.
>
>
>
> Owen DuBose wrote:
>
> > Just wanted to say hello to everyone. I just joined up here and
> > wanted to give some information.
> >
> > My nameis Owen DuBose and I'm a relatively new player to EQ but a
> > lifelong sci-fi, fantasy and RPG fan. My partner Dan Watson and I
> > both play EQ on the Brell Serilis server and are looking for other
> > gay/lesbian friends to meet on our server.
> >
> > My primary character is an Ogre ShadowKnight named Grackk, level 12,
> > currently sittinga round Neriak (a/k/a Scrunchyville) trying to level
> > up fletching, smithing and brewing skills while taking side trips to
> > Lavastorm to kill drakes and rock dervishes :)
> >
> > My secondary character is a Human Cleric named Dhalgren who is
> > currentl hanging in N. Qeynos taking trips to Blackburrow to harass
> > some the gnolls. He is 6th level.
> >
> > Dan's primary character is a 13th lvl DE Necro named Staben who is, I
> > believe currently blitzing around E Commons/N ro/ S Ro and Oasis.
> >
> > Dan has a secondary character he hasn't even played yet, lol.
> >
> > We are very interested in the possibilty of being a part of a g/l
> > guild on Brell or starting one if there isn't one. We are also
> > interested in locating other "bear" and "big bear" buddies on Brell
> > to group with or talk to.
> >
> > Feel free to to email me at bigbear@...!
> >
> > Thanks
> >
> > Owen
> >
>
>
>
> ________________________________________________________________________
> ________________________________________________________________________
>
> Message: 2
> Date: Fri, 08 Dec 2000 10:37:39 -0500
> From: Andy Cottrell <andy@...>
> Subject: Re: Hello all
>
> Just a clarification. I was not putting down the bear guild on Lanys
T'Vyl.
> The people I have met there have been nothing but nice to me. I was just
used
> to a bigger guild. After I read my post it looked like a put down which
I
> didn't mean at all. Please accept this apology.
>
> Andy Cottrell
> Taren Despottrell
> Mystic Alliance Guildleader
> 41st Barbarian Shaman
>

> Message: 3
> Date: Fri, 8 Dec 2000 11:10:43 -0700 (MST)
> From: Christina Norman <tina@...>
> Subject: Re: Hello all
>
>
> Hey Owen!
>
> We used to have a fairly active gay guild on Brell Serilis, but lately
> it's been quite dead there. I am retired from EQ myself, but I have a 54
> enchanter and a 52 ranger on Brell. If you need to borrow some plat, or
> need some jewlery made, feel free to email me.
>
> Most of our group is on Rodcet Nife where I understand we have a fairly
> active happy guild.
>
> If you would like to be part of the queer guild on Brell I can add you as
> well but it is pretty dead. We're called "Mystical Alliance" on both
> Brell and Rodcet.
>
> - Christina
>
